column4: @Rhetorical nice question i m looking for the solution too :)
It's probable something very simple, I just don't have any idea to start going about it.
I have already installed Ubuntu, so knowing what I should have done isn't much help.  I would prefer to know what I can do now
I want to use the Windows bootloader, not GRUB.  How can I change it so it uses the Windows bootloader?
